There is some kind of memory access error in [SplineTest.EnsureNoLoop](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/78bcff3553cadd2b2d672da69238956031967e6d/src/Spline_TEST.cc?at=ign-math3&fileviewer=file-view-default#Spline_TEST.cc-86). The test passes on Linux but [fails on osx](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_math-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/180/testReport/junit/(root)/Results/test_ran/) ([backtrace here](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/1ee1355022ce36a80c25f03fff47ef5e#file-backtrace-txt)). We didn't notice it until now because we don't have jenkins jobs for the `ign-math3` branch and this test hasn't been merged forward to default yet.

Though the test passes on Linux, there are some [valgrind memcheck complaints](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/1ee1355022ce36a80c25f03fff47ef5e#file-valgrind-txt) when running the test.
content.html:
There is some kind of memory access error in SplineTest.EnsureNoLoop. The test passes on Linux but fails on osx (backtrace here). We didn't notice it until now because we don't have jenkins jobs for the ign-math3 branch and this test hasn't been merged forward to default yet.

Though the test passes on Linux, there are some valgrind memcheck complaints when running the test.
